title: Smart Analytics, Machine Learning, and AI on Google Cloud
description: This course covers integrating machine learning into data pipelines on Google Cloud, including AutoML and custom ML models. It provides a comprehensive overview of building and managing ML solutions.

title: Managing Machine Learning Projects with Google Cloud
description: This course helps learners understand the key considerations for managing ML projects, including assessing feasibility, data governance, and creating a culture of innovation.

title: Digital Transformation Using AI/ML with Google Cloud
description: This specialization covers how AI and ML can drive digital transformation in businesses. It includes courses on cloud concepts, application modernization, and managing ML projects.

title: Building Machine Learning Solutions with Vertex AI
description: This course focuses on using Google Cloud's Vertex AI to build and deploy machine learning models. It includes hands-on labs and projects to reinforce learning.

title: AI for Business Leaders
description: This course is designed for business leaders to understand the fundamentals of AI and its strategic implications for business transformation.
